overview:
Born in Buenos Aires, Argentina on August 9th, 1979, Diego is graphic designer graduated from ORT Technical School.

He worked in the design and communication department at Canal 9 (Channel 9) for over 7 years where he participated working among groups developing different projects regarding institutional communication and ON AIR products for over 30 top TV shows in Argentina.

In his experience, he participated in several releases for massive consumer products and shows for television, Internet, multimedia, advertising and promotion. Also he was a head professor for the “Multimedia Design” and “Graphic Design” courses at the UP (University of Palermo). Also, he published articles related to design, effective communication and NLP.

He is a member of the UDGBA (Union of Graphic Designers of Buenos Aires) and was invited as a assistant professor by the architect Roxana Meyjide who is the leader professor of one of the graphic design careers at the UBA (University of Buenos Aires).

In the present he works at BlueFever while participating in the direction, managing and marketing for several companies, not only on strategic issues but also art direction and communication.
